<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Query.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery/#ab28fca6f8145be28b70ad89bb0c741b0">Types</a>&#91;0&#93;.isVector())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstSize &lt; 8 || DstSize &gt;= 128 || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(DstSize))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extending to a scalar s128 needs narrowing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> &amp;SrcTy = Query.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery/#ab28fca6f8145be28b70ad89bb0c741b0">Types</a>&#91;1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we fit in a register otherwise. Don&#39;t bother checking that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the source type is below 128 bits. We shouldn&#39;t be allowing anything</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// through which is wider than the destination in the first place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcSize = SrcTy.getSizeInBits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcSize &lt; 8 || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(SrcSize))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by creating a MOVK that sets bits 48-63 of the register to (global address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// + 4294967296 - PC) &gt;&gt; 48 The additional 4294967296 offset here is to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prevent an incorrect tag being generated during relocation when the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// global appears before the code section. Without the offset, a global at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;0x0f00&#39;0000&#39;0000&#39;1000&#96; (i.e. at &#96;0x1000&#96; with tag &#96;0xf&#96;) that&#39;s referenced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by code at &#96;0x2000&#96; would result in &#96;0x0f00&#39;0000&#39;0000&#39;1000 - 8192 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0x0eff&#39;ffff&#39;ffff&#39;f000&#96;, meaning the tag would be incorrectly set to &#96;0xe&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instead of &#96;0xf&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This assumes that we&#39;re in the small code model so we can assume a binary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size of &lt;= 4GB, which makes the untagged PC relative offset positive. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// binary must also be loaded into address range &#91;0, 2^48). Both of these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// properties need to be ensured at runtime when using tagged addresses.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AArch64LegalizerInfo::legalizeCTPOP(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizerhelper">LegalizerHelper</a> &amp;Helper)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When there is no integer popcount instruction (FEAT&#95;CSSC isn&#39;t available),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it can be more efficiently lowered to the following sequence that uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AdvSIMD registers/instructions as long as the copies to/from the AdvSIMD</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers are cheap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  FMOV    D0, X0        // copy 64-bit int to vector, high bits zero&#39;d</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  CNT     V0.8B, V0.8B  // 8xbyte pop-counts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ADDV    B0, V0.8B     // sum 8xbyte pop-counts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  UMOV    X0, V0.B&#91;0&#93;   // copy byte result back to integer reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 128 bit vector popcounts, we lower to the following sequence:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  cnt.16b   v0, v0  // v8s16, v4s32, v2s64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  uaddlp.8h v0, v0  // v8s16, v4s32, v2s64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  uaddlp.4s v0, v0  //        v4s32, v2s64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  uaddlp.2d v0, v0  //               v2s64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 64 bit vector popcounts, we lower to the following sequence:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  cnt.8b    v0, v0  // v4s16, v2s32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  uaddlp.4h v0, v0  // v4s16, v2s32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  uaddlp.2s v0, v0  //        v2s32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineIRBuilder &amp;MIRBuilder = Helper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizerhelper/#ae50d11fc026093629c27142780ff1405">MIRBuilder</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %OldLo = G&#95;EXTRACT %out, 0</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The locality degree is the opposite of the cache speed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Put the number the other way around.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The encoding starts at 0 for level 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Locality = 3 - Locality;</span></CodeLine>
